the.railsi.st

About

the.railsi.st is Patrick Crowley.

I'm a Rails developer and this blog is a record of my experiences using Ruby on Rails to build web apps.

I also run SD Ruby, a local Ruby group in San Diego known for its podcast.

Plugins

  • Javascripter - Organize your .js
  • Headliner - DRY up page titles
  • Styler - Stylesheets made easy

Problems installing restful_auth?

When installing restful_authentication, you run this command:

patrick$: script/generate authenticated user sessions --include-activation

And get this error.

invalid option: --include-activation

What's wrong with this picture? Remove acts_as_authenticated. You can't use both plugins at the same time.

Dumb, but I'm sure I won't be the only one.
